name: c89f779c-a0da-58d0-8576-207fdeb442e1
notes: The PTPARL Corpus contains approximately 975,806 running words of European Portuguese. It includes 1076 texts consisting of adapted transcriptions of the Portuguese parliament sessions, which were made available in 2004.
title: PTPARL Corpus
